prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Drums, Guitar, and a Synth Pad, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Drums, Guitar, and a Synth Pad, omitting the Piano.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, but it does have Bass, Drums, Guitar, and a Synth Pad.
